value.name: Fulton man dead after Callaway County single-vehicle crash
value.description: 30-year-old Cody Evans was killed in a single-vehicle crash on westbound US 54 in Callaway County. Troopers responded to the crash at US 54 at County Road 240 around 7:50 a.m. MSHP said the ...

value.name: Crash in Callaway County leaves Fulton man dead
value.description: The driver, later identified as 30-year-old Cody Evans of Fulton, was pronounced dead at University Hospital.

value.name: Fort Oglethorpe Arrest Report For May 23-29
value.description: Here is the Fort Oglethorpe arrest report for May 23-29: Tamara Nicole Maye, 26, of 96 Hudson Street, Rossville was arrested May 22 on charges of theft by shoplifting and probation violation.
